channel.title: Fixed!
channel.description:
Hey i am trying to make my own 317 from a blank 317 source called Blankscape. i want to add shops but i dont know how.
This is what i want to do:
I placed 1 shop (thessalia) and my shops.cfg is empty ok now i want to add items in thessalia's shop.
How do i add the items?

item.title: Fixed!
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Wellz, im not sure how to take it out of “talk” and put it inside “trade”. Good luck with that lol, i havent found that out myself.

Read full topic
